name: DreamBound Zombie
description:
This fangame is a present for Kureiji Ollie, from her Zomrade fans.
She's a one unique lovely zombie idol from Hololive Indonesia, 2nd Generation.

In this game you play as Ollie who's trapped in her own dreamscape. Help her to reach the lower part of the dreamscape by collecting pieces of messages, and uncovers what message that awaits.

Ollie played the game; I'm very grateful and happy that she enjoys it 💖 UPDATE (April 3rd, 2022) DreamBound Zombie v1.6
  • Changed few obstacles: to avoid player burried on tiles
  • Added simple timer: for speedrunning purpose, which will pauses when Ollie talks with the NPC. Access timer on stage by pressing T. Due to limitation, if timer gets wonky please restart the timer by re-pressing T.
  • Fixed Typo: earlier I mentioned Pixel Game Maker VX on credit section, now it reads as Pixel Game Maker MV.
  • Now you can exit the game: when reaching the end of the game, press X to exit the game.
Future Update Plans
  • Hololive Indonesia based stages
  • Save-points
  • Play as different characters from Hololive Indonesia
------------Q&A------------

Q: Why the game has no checkpoint?

A: The game is already short enough, there's no checkpoints needed.

Q: Is this game free?

A: Yes its 100% free, and made with love.

Q: Only windows..?

A: Sadly yes. Pixel Game Maker MV only able to produce windows & nintendo switch games.

Q: Why there's [unencrypted] on the .zip file name?

A: because I will let you guys to look at the assets files; the art and the audio. I made 2 version, encrypted and unencrypted; and I decided to just release the unencrypted ones.

Q: I can't open the game, it said system error. the code execution cannot proceed because MSVCP120.dll was not found!!

A: Its because you don't have MSVCP120.dll on your PC. https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=40784 this is the download link, try to put it on the same folder as the .exe file. This is also the same in case the game asking for other kind of .dll files.
